translations: 辛勤工作（moil 的 ing 形式）；不断动摇

sentences.sentence: Those people that are toiling and moiling will get no more than peanuts.
sentences.translation: 那些辛辛苦苦累死累活的人挣不到几个子儿。

sentences.sentence: "Why not come and chat with me," said the Grasshopper, "instead of toiling and moiling away?"
sentences.translation: “何不来和我聊聊天，”蚱蜢说，“没必要这样辛苦吧？”

sentences.sentence: After so many years toiling and moiling for other people, he was glad to have the chance of working for himself.
sentences.translation: 这么多年来他都是辛辛苦苦地为别人干，现在他很高兴有机会为自己干了。
